text: Dr. Jekyll and Sister Hyde is a 1971 British science fiction horror movie directed by Roy Ward Baker and is based on the 1886 novella Strange Case of Dr Jekyll and Mr Hyde by Robert Louis Stevenson. It stars Ralph Bates, Martine Beswick, Gerald Sim, Lewis Fiander and was distributed by Hammer Film Productions. == Other websites == * * * Category:1971 science fiction movies Category:1971 horror movies Category:British science fiction movies Category:British horror movies Category:Science fiction horror movies Category:Movies directed by Roy Ward Baker Category:Dr. Jekyll and Mr. Hyde movies
title: Dr. Jekyll and Sister Hyde
